pages.text: This portal can only be lit in the Tropospherical Dimension, and will take the player to the End to begin the Sixth boss fight.$(br)This portal is made from "Tropospherical End Portal Frames"

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Shifting Crystal Tablet"
This portal can only be lit in the Tropospherical Dimension, and will take the player to the Tropospherical Nether$(br)This portal is made from "Tropospherical Nether Portal Frames"

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using a $(item)"Bucket of Lava"
This portal can only be lit in the Tropospherical Dimension, and will take the player back to the Stratospherical Dimension.$(br)This portal is made from "Tropospherical Portal Frames"

pages.name: Return Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Purple Dragon Essence"
